title: NASA’s First Flight With Crew Important Step on Long-term Return to the Moon, Missions to Mars
summary: The Artemis II test flight will be NASA’s first mission with crew under Artemis. title: NASA’s Deep Space Network Starts New Dish, Marks 60 Years in Australia
summary: Canberra joined the global network in 1965 and operates four radio antennas. Now, preparations have begun on its fifth as NASA works to increase the network’s capacity. NASA’s Deep Space Network facility in Canberra, Australia celebrated its 60th anniversary on March 19 while also breaking ground on a new radio antenna. The pair of achievements […]

title: GITAI creates US defense subsidiary to chase prime government contracts
summary:
